Title: subtractYears
Description: Subtracts a specified number of years from a date, a date with time or a string-encoded date / date with time.
date: Date / date with time to subtract specified number of years from. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64, String.num: Number of years to subtract. (U)Int*, Float*.
Returns date minus num years. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-01-01') AS date,    toDateTime('2024-01-01 00:00:00') AS date_time,    '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AS date_time_stringSELECT    subtractYears(date, 1) AS subtract_years_with_date,    subtractYears(date_time, 1) AS subtract_years_with_date_time,    subtractYears(date_time_string, 1) AS subtract_years_with_date_time_string
